identity.mission: Create a 'Swiss Style' music theory app that feels like a high-end interactive poster. Prioritize clarity, rhythm, and negative space.
principles: Fusion: Music Theory x Swiss Graphic Design
Emotion: Focused, Precise, Academic yet Playful
Content: The 'Chord' is the hero. Everything else is supporting cast.
Contrast: High contrast for readability (Black on White, Blue on White).

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16 for containers. Gap-4 or Gap-6 for grids.

grid_system.bento_card: bg-white border border-border p-6 flex flex-col justify-between

buttons.default: rounded-none border-2 border-primary bg-transparent text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-200 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-sm px-6 py-3
buttons.primary: rounded-none bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] transition-all
buttons.chord_key: h-16 md:h-24 w-full rounded-sm border border-border bg-white hover:border-primary hover:text-primary hover:bg-blue-50 transition-all text-lg md:text-xl font-bold flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-white border border-border rounded-sm shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.bento: h-full flex flex-col justify-between p-6 bg-white border border-border/60 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: rounded-none border-b-2 border-border bg-transparent px-0 py-2 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 transition-colors text-lg

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay or dot pattern on the main background to avoid flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Sharp, hard shadows for buttons (brutalist touch). Soft, diffuse shadows for modals.

images.description: Subtle white wall texture for background depth
Geometric lines for hero section or empty states

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Stroke width: 1.5px or 2px.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Use 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' for a stricter, Swiss look.
Game logic: 12 Major chords on top row(s), 12 Minor chords on bottom row(s).
Feedback must be immediate (visual flash on the button).

instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use Context API or Zustand for global game state (score, settings, history).
instructions_to_main_agent.database: Ensure MongoDB schemas track: 'userId', 'sessionDate', 'mode' (timed/untimed), 'key' (C Major, etc.), 'score', 'accuracy', 'mistakes' (list of confused chords).
